Study: Predictors of mortality in hospitalized COVID-19 patients: A systematic review and meta-analysis.

Study: Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes and COVID-19 related mortality in England: a whole population study

Study: Effect of underlying comorbidities on the infection and severity of COVID-19 in South Korea

Study: Does comorbidity increase the risk of patients with COVID-19: evidence from meta-analysis

Study: History of coronary heart disease increases the mortality rate of COVID-19 patients: a nested case-control study

Study: History of coronary heart disease increases the mortality rate of COVID-19 patients: a nested case-control study

Study: Coronavirus Disease 2019 in elderly patients: characteristics and prognostic factors based on 4-week follow-up

Study: Myocardial injury is associated with in-hospital mortality of confirmed or suspected COVID-19 in Wuhan, China: A single center retrospective cohort study

Study: Epidemiological characteristics of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Tianjin
